00060                                                                                                                             {
00061   CGRect screenRect = [[UIScreen mainScreen] bounds];
00062   switch (direction) {
00063     case kFTAnimationBottom: {
00064       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00065       return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, screenRect.size.height + extraOffset);
00066       break;
00067     }
00068     case kFTAnimationTop: {
00069       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00070       return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, screenRect.origin.y - extraOffset);
00071       break;
00072     }
00073     case kFTAnimationLeft: {
00074       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00075       return CGPointMake(screenRect.origin.x - extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00076       break;
00077     }
00078     case kFTAnimationRight: {
00079       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00080       return CGPointMake(screenRect.size.width + extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00081       break;
00082     }
00083   }
00084   return CGPointZero;
